      • findReactantRatio

        public static double findReactantRatio(java.lang.String equation,
                                       int relativeToReactant)
        Computes the mol ratio of a formula relative to a given reactant.
        Parameters:
        equation - an equation, as a String
        relativeToReactant - the index (starting at 0) of the reactant relative to which the mol ratio will be found
        Returns:
        the mol ratio relative to the given reactant

      • percentYield

        public static double percentYield(java.lang.String baseEquation,
                                  double actualYield,
                                  double gramsOfReactant,
                                  int indexOfReactant,
                                  int indexOfProduct)
        Computes the percent yield of a reaction, first by finding theoretical yield, then by determining percent yield.
        Parameters:
        baseEquation - the equation to work with
        actualYield - actual yield of the reaction
        gramsOfReactant - amount of reactant available to react, in grams
        indexOfReactant - the number, beginning with 1, of the limiting reactant
        indexOfProduct - the number, beginning with 1, of the product to compute percent yield of
        Returns:
        percent yield of the given product

      • percentYield

                                  double actualYield,
                                  double gramsOfReactant,

        Parameters:

        actualYield - actual yield of the reaction
        gramsOfReactant - amount of reactant available to react, in grams
        indexOfReactant - the number, beginning with 1, of the limiting reactant
        indexOfProduct - the number, beginning with 1, of the product to compute percent yield of
        Returns:
        percent yield of the given product
